overview: RE:PRODUCTION is an exploration of the fetish known as 'milking'. In short, this consists of the modification of 1950's cow milking machines for the use of humans.  Inspired by a Craigs List Casual Encounter ad, RE:PRODUCTION imagines a dystopia future in which male sexuality, increasingly desensitised and dehumanised, has been reduced to a necessary process more in common with a mass production 'milking' factory.
title: RE:PRODUCTION
